Name: Reading Simulator
About the game: When was the last time you read a book? Are you too lazy to go to the library? Now you have the chance! In Reading Simulator you have a library filled with books ready for you to explore. In fact, almost every single book you can find in the library contains a literary classic. Everything you have to do is to find a book you want to read and click it. The book will pop up on your screen and you will be ready to flip through it, just like in a real library. In total, the library carries over 100 books containing over 10,000 pages. Featured classics: Dracula by Bram Stoker Pride and Prejudice by Jane Austen Oliver Twist by Charles Dickens The Republic by Plato Frankenstein by Mary Shelley And many, many more...
